title: PSA : Supports CAN be overpowered too
body:
No, Ivern and Lulu are not balanced, they are gossly overpowered.

Being a support doesnt make you immune from being nerfed, just a lot of ppl around here doesnt seem to grasp this.

replies.body: I'd say that Ivern is pretty OP right now but i've heard that Lulu is OP because of metashifts, but don't quote me onit.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EhW3oHRA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-29T21:58:09.736+0000)

> Ivern is not even a support. 
> Not sure if bad bait or just bad..

Ivern is a jungle support.    His job isn't to secure kills for himself, it's to assist the team and he buffs allies with shields and provides invisibility via bushes.   He's an enchanter.
Support is not a lane. Ivern is a support.

> [{quoted}](name=WhoIsThisDude,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EhW3oHRA,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2017-03-29T22:12:34.786+0000)
>
> Support is not a lane. Ivern is a support.

And that's the problem I see with peoples complaints about supports. They will complain about a non support, (mage support) in the duo lane, and does well. meanwhile people also complain about supports in any other position, except in the gold starved bot lane position. (Thus having more than one support on a team.)
Hes basically a jungling support tho

Ivern: yeah
Lulu: not so much; just strong for meta
Ivern is disgusting right now. I permaban him whenever I can

how am i stuck with a 56% winrate and 60% on lulu 

c fucking x

Lulu's kit isn't inherently toxic tbh. I feel like some hotfixes or number changes could balance her pretty well.
On the other hand, Ivern is straightup broken and needs some sort of rework in his kit.
